New In-Store Services Available From Behr Paint & Home Depot
Dear {!if(Lead.FirstName="", Contact.FirstName,Lead.FirstName)},
In our continued effort to offer outstanding service to our customers, Behr is excited to announce the addition of a new support position from your Behr Team & The Home Depot.
Ruben Ayala now holds the position of Pro Paint Sales & Service Specialist at The Thomas Road Home Depot, Store 477. Ruben is a full time Behr Employee working within the store to support our Professional Behr Customers with their product & service needs. Think of it as your Behr Paint Store within The Home Depot.
In his role, Ruben will be able to:
- Take your orders by phone on his direct line.
- Process your orders and have them available for pick up or delivery.
- Schedule deliveries.
- Color matching.
- Capture & record your color information by job.
In addition, The Thomas Road Home Depot offers:
- Increased inventory levels to support your projects.
- Expanded product offering including products such as DTM, Block Filler & Dryfall.
Ruben will be available to service your needs Monday thru Friday from 7:00am through 4:00pm. His contact info is:
Cell: (480) 521-2192
Email: RAyala@BehrPaint.com
Home Depot Thomas Road #477
3609 E Thomas Rd
Phoenix, AZ 85018
Please don't hesitate to give Ruben a call for your Behr Paint needs. We look forward to serving you!
Sincerely,
